roles.name: alchemist
roles.info: Villagers to the left and right of me [Range 2] are cured from Corruption. Learn how many I cured.
roles.hint: Range 2: 2 Villagers to the left of me and 2 Villagers to the right of me are affected.

roles.name: architect
roles.info: Learn which side of the circle is more Evil. Learn 'Equal' if both sides are equally Evil.
roles.hint: My measurement includes the two characters at the exact midpoints of the circle as well.

roles.name: baa
roles.info:
One fake Outcast is added to the Deck view.
I Lie and Disguise.

roles.name: baker
roles.info: Reveal: 1 random Unrevealed Good Villager becomes a Baker. Learn which Villager I was.
roles.hint: If Lies: I say that I was a random Villager role.

roles.name: bard
roles.info: Learn how far I am from closest Corrupted character.
roles.note: CORRUPTED: Corrupted characters will Lie and their ability will not work.

roles.name: bishop
roles.info: Learn up to 3 characters. Among them are 1 Villager, 1 Outcast and 1 Evil if possible.
roles.hint: If Lies: All characters in my info are Villagers.

roles.name: bombardier
roles.info: Lose if you Execute me.

roles.name: confessor
roles.info: If I am Evil or Corrupted: "I am dizzy"
roles.hint: I can not Lie.

roles.name: counsellor
roles.game_start: One Villager becomes an Outcast role. I sit next to it.
roles.info: I Lie and Disguise.

roles.name: doppelganger
roles.game_start: I Disguise as a Good Villager currently in play.
roles.hint: Always consider themselves as a Disguised role.

roles.name: dreamer
roles.ability: Pick 1 character: Learn an Evil role. If Evil picked, learn correct info.
roles.hint: If NOT Lying: Wretch looks like a Cabbage to me. Still can't unsee that last dream.

roles.name: druid
roles.ability: Pick 3 characters: Learn 1 random Outcast among them (if any).
roles.hint: Wretch does not appear as an Outcast for her.

roles.name: drunk
roles.info: I Disguise as a random not in play Villager. I am Corrupted and I Lie. I can not be Cured.
roles.hint: You receive 2 damage instead of 5 when you Execute me.

roles.name: empress
roles.info: Learn 3 characters. Only 1 is Evil.
roles.hint: If Lies: All characters in my info are Good.

roles.name: enlightened
roles.info: Learn if closest Evil to me is Clockwise or Counter-Clockwise. Learn 'Equidistant' if Evils are at the same distance from me.

roles.name: fortune teller
roles.ability: Pick 2 characters: Learn if any of them is Evil.

roles.name: gemcrafter
roles.info: Learn 1 Good character.

roles.name: hunter
roles.info: Learn how far from me is the nearest Evil.

roles.name: jester
roles.ability: Pick 3 characters: Learn how many of them are Evil.

roles.name: judge
roles.ability: Pick 1 character: Learn if they're Lying.

roles.name: knight
roles.info: I can't die.
roles.hint: If I am Executed while Corrupted: I deal 4 additional damage to you.

roles.name: knitter
roles.info: Learn how many Evils are adjacent to each other.

roles.name: lover
roles.info: Learn how many Evil characters I am adjacent to.

roles.name: medium
roles.info: Learn a Good character and its role.
roles.hint: If Lies: My info includes Disguised character.

roles.name: minion
roles.info: I Lie and Disguise.

roles.name: oracle
roles.info: Learn that 1 out of 2 characters is a specific Minion role.
roles.hint: If Lies: Both characters in my info are Good.

roles.name: plague doctor
roles.ability: Pick 1 character: If its Corrupted, Learn an Evil character.
roles.hint: I always see myself as NOT Corrupted, even if I am Evil.

roles.name: poet
roles.info: Learn random info.

roles.name: poisoner
roles.game_start: One adjacent Villager is Corrupted (if possible).
roles.info: I Lie and Disguise.

roles.name: pooka
roles.game_start: Villagers adjacent to me are Corrupted (if possible).
roles.info: I Lie and Disguise.

roles.name: puppet
roles.info: I Disguise as a Villager, I don't Lie.
roles.hint: Can only be created by the Puppeteer.

roles.name: puppeteer
roles.game_start: Random adjacent Villager becomes a Puppet if possible (It's Evil, but can not Lie).
roles.info: I Lie and Disguise.

roles.name: scout
roles.info: Learn how far a specific Evil is to another closest Evil.
roles.hint: Tells you distance from 1 random Evil to its nearest Evil.

roles.name: shaman
roles.game_start: There are 2 same Villager roles in current Village.
roles.info: I Lie and Disguise.

roles.name: slayer
roles.ability: Pick 1 character: If Evil picked, Execute it.
roles.hint: If Lies: I can not kill my target.

roles.name: twin minion
roles.info: I Lie and Disguise.

roles.name: witch
roles.info: You can not Reveal the last card. I Lie and Disguise.
roles.hint: You can reveal the last card after I die.

roles.name: witness
roles.info: Learn a character that was affected by an Evil ability.
roles.hint:
Can Learn:
- Who is the Puppet
- Corrupted character by an Evil
- Villager turned into Outcast by Counsellor
- Cloned character by Shaman
- Who was killed by an Evil

roles.name: wretch
roles.info: I Register as a random Evil Minion to other characters.
roles.hint: I can not Register as Good or as Wretch to other characters. I only Register as a random Minion role or as an Evil. Can not be Disguised as.
